tooltip.sculkhorde.default:
o luka e nena [§eSHIFT§r] la sina lukin e kepeken.
o luka e nena [§eCTRL§r] la sina lukin e toki musi.
tooltip.sculkhorde.in_development: §7§omi pini ala pali e ijo ni. o jan ma ala kepeken ona. pali taso la ona li pona.
tooltip.sculkhorde.warden_beef: §7§ojan li moku e ni la, ijo pi pini ala li lon.
item.sculkhorde.dev_node_spawner: ilo pali pi insa Sculk lawa
tooltip.sculkhorde.dev_node_spawner: §7§oni li lon e insa lawa Sculk lon sina
tooltip.sculkhorde.custom_item_projectil: §7§oni li ijo pi jan pali. ona li sama ijo ale pana. mi sona e ni kepeken ona: ijo pana li pona ala pona?
tooltip.sculkhorde.sculk_acidic_projecti: §7§oni li ijo pana li tan §e§omonsuta Sculk pana§f§7§o. ijo pana li luka e leko la, ni li ken kama. jan li ken pana e ona.
§7§oko ni li seli li wawa, li ken pakala e ijo ale.
tooltip.sculkhorde.calcite_clump.functio: §7§oni li tan §e§okiwen sijelo walo lon insa kiwen sijelo§f§7§o lon §e§opalisa pi kiwen sijelo§f§7§o.
tooltip.sculkhorde.calcite_clump.lore: §7§oijo ni li kiwen li sama palisa sijelo.
block.sculkhorde.calcite_ore: kiwen sijelo walo lon insa kiwen sijelo
tooltip.sculkhorde.calcite_ore.functiona: §7§oni li tan §e§opalisa pi kiwen sijelo§f§7§o lon poka §e§oinsa lawa Sculk§f§7§o.
tooltip.sculkhorde.calcite_ore.lore: §7§oijo ni li kiwen li sama palisa sijelo.
tooltip.sculkhorde.sculk_resin.functiona: §7§oni li tan §e§opoki pini§f§7§o lon anpa §e§otomo pi pipi Sculk§f§7§o.
tooltip.sculkhorde.sculk_resin.lore: §7§ojan li ken pali mute kepeken ko ni.
tooltip.sculkhorde.infested_log.lore: §7§oni li lukin sama sijelo kasi. taso, ona li kiwen nasa sama palisa sijelo.
block.sculkhorde.infested_cobblestone_st: leko sewi Sculk pi kiwen nena
block.sculkhorde.infested_blue_terracott: ma kiwen Sculk pi loje telo
block.sculkhorde.infested_brown_terracot: ma kiwen Sculk pi kule ma
block.sculkhorde.infested_gray_terracott: ma kiwen Sculk pi pimeja walo
block.sculkhorde.infested_green_terracot: ma kiwen Sculk pi laso kasi
block.sculkhorde.infested_light_blue_ter: ma kiwen Sculk pi laso sewi
block.sculkhorde.infested_light_gray_ter: ma kiwen Sculk pi walo pimeja
block.sculkhorde.infested_lime_terracott: ma kiwen Sculk pi laso jelo
block.sculkhorde.infested_magenta_terrac: ma kiwen Sculk pi loje laso
block.sculkhorde.infested_orange_terraco: ma kiwen Sculk pi loje jelo
block.sculkhorde.infested_pink_terracott: ma kiwen Sculk pi loje walo
block.sculkhorde.infested_purple_terraco: ma kiwen Sculk pi laso loje
tooltip.sculkhorde.infested_crying_obsid: leko Sculk nasa. sina kute e kalama uta pi ijo moli tan lon insa ona. kon kalama li tan ona.
tooltip.sculkhorde.sculk_node: insa ni li insa lawa namako pi lawa Sculk, li lawa mute e ijo Sculk ale lon poka ona.
block.sculkhorde.sculk_dura_matter: selo kiwen pi insa lawa Sculk
tooltip.sculkhorde.spike: soweli li noka e palisa utala ni la, ona li jaki e soweli ni li pakala.
tooltip.sculkhorde.tendrils: kasi nasa ni li sama kasi linja li pilin sama sijelo
tooltip.sculkhorde.sculk_summoner.functi: §7§oni li kama e monsuta Sculk. ona li kute e ijo la, ona li kama mute e monsuta Sculk li lape lon tenpo lili
tooltip.sculkhorde.sculk_summoner.lore: §7§oleko ni pi nasa mute li pali e monsuta Sculk tan leko Sculk lon poka. sama soko Sculk kalama la, ona li lukin pali li lukin pali ala. ona li pakala ala la, kon lon insa ona li kute pi wile ala e kulupu Sculk. sina wile pana e luka sina tawa insa. taso, sina wile kin e luka ni.
tooltip.sculkhorde.sculk_bee_nest.functi: §7§okulupu pi pipi suwi Sculk mute li tomo lon ni li pali e moku e soko Sculk lon ni. jan li ken kama jo e §e§oko pipi Sculk§r§7§o tan §e§opoki§r§7§o lon anpa ona. soko Sculk li kama suli la, ona li pali e ni.
tooltip.sculkhorde.sculk_bee_nest.lore: §7§oni li tomo pi pipi suwi Sculk. pipi suwi Sculk li pali e moku Sculk tan kasi Sculk li pana e ona lon ni. ni la, moku Sculk li kama lon, li suli e ma Sculk. pakala pi ijo ni li suli mute.
tooltip.sculkhorde.sculk_bee_nest_cell.f: §7§oni li pini la, jan li ken kama jo e §e§oko pipi Sculk§r§7§o kepeken ilo kipisi lili. ko laso li lon la, ni li pini.
tooltip.sculkhorde.sculk_bee_nest_cell.l: §7§opoki ni li tomo pi kulupu pi pipi suwi Sculk. pipi la, poki ni li nasin, li poki pi ko pipi.
tooltip.sculkhorde.sculk_living_rock.fun: jan li ken pali e §e§osinpin pi soko Sculk kepeken ni§r§7§o.
tooltip.sculkhorde.sculk_living_rock.lor: §7§okiwen ni li seli, li kiwen mute, li awen pona. ona li kama suli li kama lili sama ni: ona li moku e kon.
tooltip.sculkhorde.sculk_living_rock_roo: §7§oni li insa pi palisa pi kiwen sijelo, li pona e palisa ona.
§7§oni li insa pi palisa pi kiwen sijelo. lukin la, insa li sama mute ale ante palisa. o pali pona o pakala ala e ona. taso, tenpo ale la, ona li lon insa.
tooltip.sculkhorde.dev_structure_tester: ni li leko pi pali ante, li pona e tomo pi ante ni. ni li pali e tomo lon ona.
tooltip.sculkhorde.crying_souls.function: §7§okepeken ni la, jan li pali e kon pi pona wawa e palisa utala pi soko Sculk.
tooltip.sculkhorde.crying_souls.lore: §7§oni li kon pi jan pi kama Sculk. jan ni li weka e sijelo ona, e sona ona, e nasin ona. pilin ike ona taso li awen lon.
tooltip.sculkhorde.essence_of_purity.fun: §7§ojan li pali e ijo pi pona wawa kepeken kon pona ni.
tooltip.sculkhorde.essence_of_purity.lor: §7§okipisi ni li suwi e pilin sina sama kama suno pi tenpo open anu selo luka pi jan pona.
tooltip.sculkhorde.pure_souls.functional: §7§okepeken ni la, jan li pali e ilo pi weka Sculk e §r§6pilin pi pona wawa.
tooltip.sculkhorde.pure_souls.lore: §7§okon ni pi jan pi kama Sculk li kama pona. pilin pona ona li tan sina.
tooltip.sculkhorde.chunk_o_brain.functio: §7§oni li tan pakala pi insa lawa Sculk. jan li pali e poki kon kepeken ona.
tooltip.sculkhorde.chunk_o_brain.lore: §7§okipisi seli pi insa lawa. sina pilin e wawa lon ona. sina weka e ona tan selo ona la, ona li awen pali. ken la, ni li pona tawa pali sina.
tooltip.sculkhorde.dormant_heart_of_the_: §7§opoki ni o kama pilin poki wawa. sina wile wawa e ona la, sina pana e ona lon ilo kon, li pana e kon tawa ona kepeken moli.
§7§oni li poki tawa kon. ni la, ike li jaki ala e ona.
tooltip.sculkhorde.heart_of_the_horde.fu: §7§ojan li pana e ijo ni lon ilo kon, li moli pana e ijo tawa ona. jan li pali e §r§6pilin pi pona wawa§r kepeken ni..
tooltip.sculkhorde.heart_of_the_horde.lo: §7§oni li poki ike pi kama Sculk. ike ona en jaki ona la, sina luka taso e ona la luka ona li kama pilin lili li kama pilin pi wawa ala. kon mute li lon insa, li pilin pakala. tan insa pilin poki la, sina ken kute e wile pini pi lon ike ona.
tooltip.sculkhorde.heart_of_purity.funct: §7§okepeken la, ni li pini e insa lawa Sculk suli. ni la, kulupu Sculk li kama §canpa§r§7§o.
tooltip.sculkhorde.heart_of_purity.lore: §7§oA living, beating heart that radiates warmth and purity. Holding this monumental artifact makes you feel pure and mighty. Packed within is a collection of souls you have freed from the horde. Now, they aid you in your conquest one final time before they are put to rest.
tooltip.sculkhorde.eye_of_purity.functio: §7§ojan li kama sona e insa lawa Sculk kepeken ni. jan li §e§onena nanpa tu pi ilo luka§r§7§o la, jan li pana e ona. insa lawa Sculk li lon ma sina la, ona li tawa insa lawa.
tooltip.sculkhorde.eye_of_purity.lore: §7§osona la, jan li pona wawa e oko pi ma End la, oko sin li wile tawa insa lawa Sculk. oko ni li pana e seli e suno jelo.
tooltip.sculkhorde.soul_harvester.functi: §7§okepeken ilo ni la, jan li wawa e pilin poki. ilo ni li wile e kon. Requires souls to function. ijo li moli lon poka ni la, ona li kama jo e kon ona.
tooltip.sculkhorde.soul_harvester.lore: §7§oo kama jo e kon pi ijo pi moli ala, o ike suli e ona la ona li wile moli. kute sina li lon poka ilo ni la, sina ken kute e toki ona pi wile weka. ilo kon ni li ken wawa e ijo kepeken kon ni lon poki. ni la, ona li kama ijo mani ike.
tooltip.sculkhorde.infestation_ward_bloc: §7§osoko Sculk li ken ala kama lon poka leko ni. nasin kepeken pona pi leko ni li ni: jan li selo e ma kepeken leko ni la, soko Sculk li ken ala lon ma ni!
§7§oawen pi kiwen sijelo en §e§okipisi pi pona wawa§r§7§o li weka pona e soko Sculk. sina noka e ni la sina pilin pona mute.
block.sculkhorde.infested_crimson_nylium: kiwen selo Sculk pi soko loje
block.sculkhorde.infested_warped_nylium: kiwen selo Sculk pi soko laso
block.sculkhorde.infested_smooth_basalt: kiwen Sculk pi seli lete pi selo pona
block.sculkhorde.infested_mossy_cobblest: leko sewi pi kiwen nena kasi Sculk
item.sculkhorde.sculk_spore_spewer_spawn: sike mama pi soko Sculk mama
item.sculkhorde.sculk_zombie_spawn_egg: sike mama pi jan moli Sculk
item.sculkhorde.sculk_spitter_spawn_egg: sike mama pi monsuta Sculk pana
item.sculkhorde.sculk_mite_spawn_egg: sike mama pi pipi Sculk mama
item.sculkhorde.sculk_mite_aggressor_spa: sike mama pi pipi Sculk utala
item.sculkhorde.sculk_hatcher_spawn_egg: sike mama pi soweli Sculk mama
item.sculkhorde.sculk_ravager_spawn_egg: sike mama pi monsuta suli Sculk
item.sculkhorde.sculk_vindicator_spawn_e: sike mama pi monsuta Sculk utala
item.sculkhorde.sculk_creeper_spawn_egg: sike mama pi monsuta Sculk mama
item.sculkhorde.sculk_enderman_spawn_egg: sike mama pi monsuta Sculk wawa
block.sculkhorde.dev_mass_infectinator_3: ilo mama wawa pi soko Sculk
tooltip.sculkhorde.dev_mass_infectinator: leko ni li awen soko Sculk e ma suli. ni li lon tan wile awen Sculk pi jan Kewa Fen. o sona e ken pakala a!
§7§osina nena nanpa tu pi ilo luka e ni la, ona li kama ijo.
ni li ijo ala la, ni li weka e soko Sculk lon poka. kulupu Sculk li utala e ona.
§7§osina pona e ike suli kon la, kon ni li wawa e utala sina tawa kulupu Sculk.
tooltip.sculkhorde.purification_flask.fu: §7§otelo ni li lon soko Sculk la ona li weka. ni li pona e pilin 'jaki lon insa', e pilin 'kama', e pilin 'moli Sculk'. nasin pali pi telo ni li §e§okipisi pona§r§7§o lon insa poki lili luka tu wan.
tooltip.sculkhorde.purification_flask.lo: §7§oilo pona pi ike suli. sina jo e ni lon luka la, sina pilin seli lete sama lili seli suno lon tenpo lete.
tooltip.sculkhorde.sculk_sweeper_sword.f: §7§opalisa kipisi suli li lon palisa utala ni. palisa ni li utala e ijo pi soko Sculk ala la, ijo li pakala lili. palisa ni li utala e ijo pi soko Sculk la, palisa li kama wawa. palisa li pini wawa la, jan li nena nanpa tu pi ilo luka la, palisa utala mute li kama lon noka pi ijo Sculk lon poka.
tooltip.sculkhorde.sculk_sweeper_sword.l: §7§opalisa utala nasa ni li pona tawa moli pi ijo Sculk mute. palisa kipisi li tan palisa pi §7§omonsuta Sculk wawa§r§7§o.
tooltip.sculkhorde.sculk_enderman_cleave: §7§opalisa tan ilo kipisi pi §7§omonsuta Sculk wawa§r§7§o. jan li pali e §7§opalisa utala pi soko Sculk§r§7§o kepeken ona.
§7§okiwen ni li ijo Sculk sama palisa sijelo. ni li kipisi wawa li kiwen mute.
sounds.sculkhorde.raid_start_sound: utala pi kulupu Sculk li open
sounds.sculkhorde.raid_scout: monsuta Sculk wawa li lukin e ma pi ken utala
sounds.sculkhorde.blind_and_alone_music_: sike kalama pi kalama musi 'lukin ala en taso'
jan Firel - lukin ala en taso
sounds.sculkhorde.deep_green_music_disc: sike kalama pi kalama musi 'laso wawa'
item.sculkhorde.blind_and_alone_music_di: sike kalama pi kalama musi 'lukin ala en taso'
jan Firel - lukin ala en taso
item.sculkhorde.deep_green_music_disc: sike kalama pi kalama musi 'laso wawa'
achievement.sculkhorde.sculk_horde_start: kulupu utala pi soko Sculk li kama poki ala, li kama tawa sina.
achievement.sculkhorde.sculk_horde_defea: sina pali wawa li utala wawa la, sina awen e ma lon kulupu utala pi soko Sculk, li weka e kulupu ni tan ma. ni li pali mute. taso, sina pali pona a! sina anpa e kulupu a. ike li weka. taso, pakala li awen lon ma. o tawa jaki ni o pona e ona a.
achievement.sculkhorde.sculk_evolve_imma: lawa pi kulupu Sculk o kama suli lili
achievement.sculkhorde.sculk_evolve_matu: lawa pi kulupu Sculk o kama suli
o lukin e kama pi insa lawa Sculk. insa ni li sama insa lawa, li wawa e lawa pi kulupu Sculk.
o lon tomo moli pi soko Sculk
achievement.sculkhorde.craft_essence_of_: o pali e kipisi pi pona wawa
achievement.sculkhorde.craft_purificatio: o pali e telo pi pona wawa
achievement.sculkhorde.use_soul_harveste: o kama jo e kon kepeken ilo kon
o pali e kon pi pona wawa tan kon kalama. kon kalama li tan kiwen wawa pakala Sculk.
achievement.sculkhorde.craft_infestation: o pali e sinpin pi soko Sculk. ona li pini e kama suli pi soko Sculk lon leko.
o pali e ilo pi weka Sculk
achievement.sculkhorde.craft_heart_of_th: kama moli ala tan pakala pana
o moli pana e kon tawa pilin poki wawa. o pali e pilin poki wawa kepeken ilo kon.
achievement.sculkhorde.craft_heart_of_pu: o pali e pilin pi pona wawa
tooltip.sculkhorde.coin_of_contribution: mani ni li sama pana suli sina tawa ante ni. jan sama sina li lon ala la, ante Sculk Horde kin li lon ala. mi toki e ni: sina pona! ante Sculk Horde o pona tawa sina :)
